statements.select: SELECT * FROM enterprise_sort_list where sort_id = $sort_id$

SELECT sort.user_id, sort.sort_id, user_info.company, user_info.company_en, user_info.enterprise_type FROM enterprise_sort sort INNER JOIN user_info ON sort.user_id = user_info.user_id WHERE sort.sort_id = #sort_id# and (user_info.company like '%'||#company#||'%' or user_info.company_en like '%'||#company#||'%' ) ORDER BY user_info.enterprise_type, user_info.company;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE UPPER(company) like '%'||#company#||'%' or UPPER(company_en) like '%'||#company#||'%' ORDER BY user_info.company;

select * from product_list inner join user_info ON product_list.user_id = user_info.user_id WHERE UPPER(product_name) like '%'||#product_name#||'%' or UPPER(product_name_en) like '%'||#product_name#||'%' and deleted = '1' ORDER BY user_info.company;
select * from catalog_list inner join user_info ON catalog_list.user_id = user_info.user_id WHERE UPPER(catalog_name) like '%'||#catalog_name#||'%' and deleted = '1' ORDER BY user_info.company;

SELECT sort.user_id, sort.sort_id, list.enterprise_sort_id, list.enterprise_sort_name, list.enterprise_sort_name_en, list.enterprise_sort_id_b, list.enterprise_sort_name_b, list.enterprise_sort_name_en_b FROM enterprise_sort sort INNER JOIN enterprise_sort_list list ON sort.sort_id = list.sort_id WHERE sort.user_id = #user_id# ORDER BY sort.user_id,list.enterprise_sort_id;

SELECT c.*, u.company,u.company_en FROM catalog_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id
c.user_id = #user_id#
Order By catalog_no Desc
SELECT c.*, u.company,u.company_en FROM catalog_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE UPPER(c.catalog_name) like '%'||#catalog_name#||'%' and c.deleted = '1'
SELECT c.* , u.company,u.company_en FROM catalog_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id Order By catalog_no Desc Limit $limit$
SELECT c.* , u.company,u.company_en FROM catalog_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #user_id# and c.catalog_no = #catalog_no#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM catalog_list WHERE user_id = #user_id# and catalog_no = #catalog_no#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO catalog_list( user_id,catalog_name, cover_file, catalog_file, deleted) VALUES (#user_id#,#catalog_name#,#cover_file#,#catalog_file#,#deleted#)
statements.select: SELECT c.*, u.company, u.company_en FROM video_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #user_id#
SELECT c.* , u.company, u.company_en FROM video_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id Order By video_no Desc
SELECT c.* , u.company, u.company_en FROM video_list c INNER JOIN video_active v ON c.video_no = v.video_no JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id Order By video_no Desc
SELECT c.* , u.company, u.company_en FROM video_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id Order By video_no Desc Limit $limit$
SELECT c.* , u.company, u.company_en FROM video_list c JOIN user_info u on c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #user_id# and c.video_no = #video_no#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM video_list WHERE user_id = #user_id# and video_no = #video_no#
statements.insert:
SELECT currval('video_list_video_no_seq')
INSERT INTO video_list( user_id, video_name, youtube_site) VALUES (#user_id#, #video_name#, #youtube_site#)
statements.select: SELECT * FROM video_active
SELECT * FROM product_list WHERE deleted = '1' and user_id = #user_id#
SELECT p.* , u.company , u.company_en FROM product_list p LEFT JOIN user_info u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE product_id = #product_id#

select * from product_list inner join user_info ON product_list.user_id = user_info.user_id WHERE UPPER(product_name) like '%'||#product_name#||'%' or UPPER(product_name_en) like '%'||#product_name#||'%' and deleted = '1' ORDER BY user_info.company;
statements.delete: DELETE FROM product_list WHERE user_id = #user_id# and product_id = #product_id#
UPDATE product_list SET deleted = '0' WHERE user_id = #user_id# and product_id = #product_id#
statements.insert:
SELECT currval('product_list_seq')
INSERT INTO public.product_list( user_id, product_category, product_name, product_info, model_no, patent_or_winners, specifications_or_other, product_category_en, product_name_en, product_info_en, model_no_en, patent_or_winners_en, specifications_or_other_en, product_pic_site, deleted) VALUES (#user_id#,#product_category#,#product_name#,#product_info# ,#model_no#, #patent_or_winners#, #specifications_or_other#, #product_category_en# ,#product_name_en#, #product_info_en#, #model_no_en#, #patent_or_winners_en#, #specifications_or_other_en#, #product_pic_site#, #deleted# )
statements.update:
UPDATE public.product_list SET user_id=#user_id#, product_category=#product_category#, product_name=#product_name#, product_info=#product_info#, model_no=#model_no#, patent_or_winners=#patent_or_winners#, specifications_or_other=#specifications_or_other#, product_category_en=#product_category_en#, product_name_en=#product_name_en#, product_info_en=#product_info_en#, model_no_en=#model_no_en#, patent_or_winners_en=#patent_or_winners_en#, specifications_or_other_en=#specifications_or_other_en#
product_pic_site=#product_pic_site#
, deleted=#deleted# WHERE product_id=#product_id#
statements.select: SELECT * FROM user_info ORDER BY create_time DESC Limit 10

SELECT * FROM user_info
user_id like '%'||#user_id#||'%'
company like '%'||#company#||'%'
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT user_info.* FROM user_info inner join cluster_member on user_info.user_id=cluster_member.user_id
user_info.user_id like '%'||#user_id#||'%'
user_info.company like '%'||#company#||'%'
cluster_member.cluster_no = #id# and cluster_member.cluster_enable = '1'
ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #user_id#
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #user_id#
SELECT ui.* FROM user_info ui JOIN sales.sales_info si on si.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE si.sales_id = #sales_id#
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #user_id# and user_pw = #user_pw#
SELECT * FROM honestbee_coupon WHERE user_id = #user_id# and create_time > '1911-01-02'
statements.insert:
SELECT currval('user_info_seq')
INSERT INTO user_info ( user_id, user_pw,id_enable, enterprise_type, company, leader, addr, contact, phone, email, capital, revenue, website, info, logo_img, company_en, leader_en, addr_en, contact_en, info_en ) VALUES ( #user_id#, #user_pw#,#id_enable#, #enterprise_type#, #company#, #leader#, #addr#, #contact#, #phone#, #email#, #capital#, #revenue#, #website#, #info#, #logo_img#, #company_en#, #leader_en#, #addr_en#, #contact_en#, #info_en# )

SELECT currval('user_info_seq')
INSERT INTO user_info ( user_id, user_pw,id_enable, enterprise_type, company, leader, addr, contact, phone, email, capital, revenue, website, info,phone2, email2, logo_img, company_en, leader_en, addr_en, contact_en, info_en ) VALUES ( #user_id#, #user_pw#,#id_enable#, #enterprise_type#, #company#, #leader#, #addr#, #contact#, #phone#, #email#, #capital#, #revenue#, #website#, #info#, #phone2#, #email2#, #logo_img#, #company_en#, #leader_en#, #addr_en#, #contact_en#, #info_en# )
statements.update: UPDATE user_info SET enterprise_type = #enterprise_type#, company = #company#, id_enable = #id_enable#, leader = #leader#, addr = #addr#, contact = #contact#, phone = #phone#, email = #email#, capital = #capital#, revenue = #revenue#, website = #website#, info = #info#, logo_img = #logo_img#, company_en = #company_en#, leader_en = #leader_en#, addr_en = #addr_en#, contact_en = #contact_en#, info_en = #info_en#, update_time = #update_time#, last_login_time = #last_login_time# WHERE user_id = #user_id#

UPDATE user_info SET enterprise_type = #enterprise_type#, company = #company#, id_enable = #id_enable#, leader = #leader#, addr = #addr#, contact = #contact#, phone = #phone#, email = #email#, capital = #capital#, revenue = #revenue#, website = #website#, info = #info#, logo_img = #logo_img#, company_en = #company_en#, leader_en = #leader_en#, addr_en = #addr_en#, contact_en = #contact_en#, info_en = #info_en#, phone2 = #phone2#, email2 = #email2#, update_time = #update_time# WHERE user_id = #user_id#

UPDATE user_info SET user_pw = #user_pw#, enterprise_type = #enterprise_type#, company = #company#, id_enable = #id_enable#, leader = #leader#, addr = #addr#, contact = #contact#, phone = #phone#, email = #email#, capital = #capital#, revenue = #revenue# WHERE user_id = #user_id#
UPDATE user_info SET id_enable = #id_enable# WHERE id = $id$
UPDATE user_info SET addr = #addr# WHERE user_id = #user_id#
UPDATE user_info SET capital = $capital$ WHERE capital = 0 and user_id = #user_id#
